Key Arguments: The legislation grants ACMA excessive control over online information dissemination, with penalties for dissenters.
The government and media, who are exempt from the legislation, are the main spreaders of misinformation.
The bill is seen as an infringement on fundamental human rights, including freedom of speech.
The government spread misinformation during the COVID-19 pandemic, particularly regarding vaccines and public health measures.
The proposed legislation is likened to a 'Ministry of Truth', which is opposed by the author.
Notable Quotes: This is one of the most Orwellian Bills I have ever seen a government propose in my long lifetime.
I would like to remind this committee that it was the government through its Ministers and departments, that was the super spreader of misinformation/disinformation during the so-called pandemic.
We donâ€™t want a Ministry of Truth, run by the same people who lied to us constantly during the so-called pandemic.
